title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2035/91 of 11 July 1991 fixing the amount of aid for certain grain legumes for the 1991/92 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2035/91  of 11 July 1991  fixing the amount of aid for certain grain legumes for the 1991/92 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1991/92 marketing year the aid for the production of grain legumes introduced by Regulation (EEC) No 762/89 shall be ECU 75 per hectare sown and harvested.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 July 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
